Method.Implementation: if ..pos = 0 { ;first topic begin s ..pos = pos Q 1 } s sc = ..Html.MoveTo( ..pos ), length = pos - ..pos s topicHtml = ..Html.Read( .length ) ;.... s ..pos = pos, ..row = ..row + 1 if ( ..row = 1 ) Q 1 ;first row is table header #; w !, $zcvt(topicHtml,"O","CP1251") ;1251 for Studio Output window /* Example of topic content Важно: Взаимодействие с InterSystems   [new] Шваров Евгений 11 5699 30 июн 15, 13:46 */ s topic( "Answers" ) = ..ParseAnswers( topicHtml ) s topic( "Views" ) = ..ParseViews( topicHtml ) s topic( "Updated" ) = ..ParseUpdated( topicHtml ) s topic( "ExtId" ) = ..ParseExtId( topicHtml ) if ##class(Topic).ExtIdExists(topic("ExtId")) { Q ..OnExistingTopic( .topic ) } else { s topic( "Type" ) = ..ParseType( topicHtml ) s topic( "Name" ) = ..ParseName( topicHtml ) s sc = ..ParseAuthor( topicHtml, .author ) ;complex object m topic( "Author") = author Q ..OnTopic( .topic ) }

Method.name: OnExistingTopic
Method.Implementation:
#define g(%prop) $g(data(%prop))
s topic = ##class(Topic).ExtIdOpen($$$g("ExtId")) Q:topic="" "Topic with ExtId#"_$$$g("ExtId")_"don't exist"
s difference = $$$g("Answers") - topic.Answers
if difference '= 0 {
s topic.Answers = $$$g("Answers") s topic.Updated = $$$g("Updated")
}
s topic.Views = $$$g("Views")
s sc = topic.%Save()
s:difference'=0 sc = ##class(PostsUpdater).Update($$$g("ExtId"),difference)
w sc Q sc
